author: brane
msg: Add support for / as a path separator on Windows, and avoid creating
paths that end in a "/.". This fixes issue #489.
Incidentally, this also adds infrastructure for describing the
describes the properties of a path style.
pointer to a path_style_context_t instead of a char.
(add_component_internal): Don't add a '.' if the path style disallows
(svn_path_remove_component): Use separator char from style context.
(svn_path_last_component): Check for both kinds of separators.

author: sussman
msg: Fix bug #467.   (Wow!  Pretty easy fix for a P2 bug!  :-) )
* commit.c (import):  when importing a local path, check for svn_node_none.
